alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central York and central Cumberland Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Standish, or 11 miles northwest of Westbrook, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Cumberland, Gorham, Falmouth, Gray, Raymond, Standish, Casco, Limington, Frye Island, Windham, Sebago, New Gloucester, Baldwin and North Yarmouth. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 54 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern Maine.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Interior York
